initial_question.title: Need more info!
initial_question.body:
Hi!

I really love your approach with this workflow, but I really can't grasp the procedure for, say, using canny or other controls for img2img. More specifically, I don't understand how to define the starting image: is it the latest image I generated, or the image I have in the Img Load tab?

At the end of the tutorial video you ask for feedback on the need for more videos… Well, here's feedback: yes, please! 🙃

satisfaction_conditions: Input image source location is clearly identified
Workflow sequence for canny operations is defined
Image transfer method between operations is explained
Tab purposes and functions are distinguished
Preview and adjustment capabilities are described
